value.title: Maru's MASS GHOST STRATEGY - Starcraft 2: Maru vs. Solar
value.excerpt: Maru playing Solar in a best of 5, with both players using different strategies. Maru's mass ghost style, Solar's baneling/zergling rush.  Match: Maru vs. Solar Tournament: IEM Katowice 2023 VODs: https://twitch.tv/esl_sc2   ► Enjoy the content? Buy me a coffee! https://www.ko-fi.com/SC2HL ► SUBSCRIBE

value.excerpt: AlphaStar has been playing on the StarCraft 2 ladder over the last few months. value.title: StarCraft 2: Dark's ZERGY "CANNON" RUSH vs MaxPax! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of high level StarCraft 2 between Dark (Zerg) and MaxPax (Protoss). Both players decide to go for some very fun strategies in this game. Dark opens with a Proxy Hatchery and a Spine Crawler, and in the second game MaxPax strikes back with a cheeky Adept opener off of six Gateways  Support
